entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
